global.tracemoe_api_limit: Because of the trace.moe server's limited requirements, you can only use this command once every 60 minutes.
global.welcome: We're glad to have you here!
global.command_error: An error occurred while executing the command:
global.server_register_error: Error when registering command for server:
global.error_reply: An error occurred. Please try again later.

anime.command_description: Search for information about a specific anime.

character.command_description: Search for information about a specific character.

character_search.command_description: Search for anime series that contain character.

manga.command_description: Search for information about a specific manga.

search.command_description: Search anime by image. (Supports maximum file size of 25MB)
search.file_too_large: File too large. Maximum file size is 25MB.
search.tracemoe_api_limit: The request limit for the trace.moe server has been reached. Please try again later.

staff.command_description: Search for information about a specific staff.

studio.command_description: Get information about the studio and a list of anime produced by the studio.
studio.product_list: List of anime produced by the studio

trending.command_description: Get a list of trending anime on AniList.

user.command_description: Get information about a specific user.

avatar.command_description: Get the avatar of a user.

weather.command_description: Get the weather for a specific location.

language.language_switch: Bot language has been set to:
language.respone_language: Response language has been set to:

help.command_description: Display a list of available commands.
help.title: List of commands
help.description: Here is a list of commands that I have:

youtube_trending.command_description: Get the list of trending music videos on YouTube.
youtube_trending.title: Top Trending YouTube Music Videos

youtube.command_description: Most viewed videos in the past 24 hours.
youtube.title: Most Viewed YouTube Videos

artist.command_description: Search for music videos by artist.

clear.command_description: Clear all chat history in the channel or direct messages.
clear.no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command.
clear.channel_clear: All messages have been cleared in the channel:
clear.dm_clear: All messages have been cleared in your DMs.

country.command_description: Get top trending YouTube videos of a specific country.

langlist.command_description: Get a list of available language & current language.
langlist.title: Current language:
